_t2: {{ True if not cookiecutter.MAINTAIN else False }}
_t3: {{ True if not cookiecutter.ROADMAP else False }}

__prompts__.CONTRIBUTORS: Does your project have more than one contributor?
__prompts__.RELEASE: Do you plan on cutting more than one release?
__prompts__.WORK: Do you plan on having other individuals/teams work with you?
__prompts__.MAINTAIN: Do you plan on having other individuals/teams maintain the project with you?
__prompts__.ROADMAP: Do you plan on having other individuals/teams plan the development roadmap with you?
